text: The 2014 FIRS Women's Roller Hockey World Cup or Tourcoing 2014 was the 12th edition of the women's roller hockey world cup. It was held in Tourcoing, France from October 25 to November 1, 2014 and it was contested by fourteen teams. Argentina defeated France in the final to win the World Cup. ==Group stage== ===Group A=== {| style="font-size:90%; margin: 0 auto;" |- | 26 Oct 2014 18:00 || align="right" | France ||align="center"| 18–0 || United States |- | 27 Oct 2014 16:30 || align="right" | Switzerland ||align="center"| 9–2 || United States |- | 28 Oct 2014 19:30 || align="right" | France ||align="center"| 3–0 || Switzerland |- |} ===Group B=== {| style="font- size:90%;
